name: TheAtlantic
text: For the writer-director Emerald Fennell, much of “Promising Young Woman” was about subverting ideas about femininity. “You can like Britney Spears and multicolored manicures and still be dangerous,” she told @sophieGG. https://t.co/5sTQ9cxWmK

name: TheAtlantic
text: In Eugene, Oregon, a venerable program with a silly name has successfully reduced the footprint of law enforcement—and maybe even the likelihood of police violence. Now other cities want to emulate the CAHOOTS model, writes @rowanmg. https://t.co/nDSrh8I0ol

name: TheAtlantic
text:
